title: Posto Antropométrico
body: When Dr. Joaquim Crisóstomo da Silveira was the Public Prosecutor in Funchal, an anthropometric post was installed in the district court, which still existed in 1915, as in that year, on July 22, the Municipal Council decided to provide it with various pieces of furniture that it needed.

1915: Year in which the Municipal Council provided the anthropometric post with various pieces of furniture
